name: Plants vs Marios 2
description:
Did you like the crazy fan game "Plants vs Marios" ? 

Here is Plants vs Marios 2 (PreAlpha) !

Plants vs Marios 2 is an updated version of the first crazy fangame, better optimised, with better graphics, and more !

In this game, you have to defend your house with plants because Marios became really crazy and they want to eat your ass... What will be the best strategy ?

❗ Some levels can be really hard so, be relaxed and calm when you lose or you'll break your PC and this is not cool...
